resources.string: BAZAAR : BUILD BY COAVENGERS FOR ALL THE AVENGERS E-commerce is revolutionizing the way we all shop in India. Why do you want to hop from one store to another in search of the latest phone when you can find it on the Internet in a single click? Not only mobiles. Flipkart houses everything you can possibly imagine, from trending electronics like laptops, tablets, smartphones, and mobile accessories to in-vogue fashion staples like shoes, clothing and lifestyle accessories; from modern furniture like sofa sets, dining tables, and wardrobes to appliances that make your life easy like washing machines
1076, 24th Main, 11th Cross, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102 Mobile NO: 9998887776
